long_description: The Nutcase men's bike helmet offers versatile protection and fun, vibrant designs to keep your adventures lively. Features an injection-molded ABS shell and full-surround expanded polystyrene (EPS) protective inner foam for high-impact protection. 11 front, top-mounted and rear vents help keep your noggin cool. Quick-release, padded chin strap provides 1-handed operation; rear spin dial allows a custom fit around head. Includes 2 sets of removable low-density polyurethane foam insert liners for refining the fit or easy replacement.
short_description: The Nutcase men's bike helmet offers versatile protection and fun, vibrant designs to keep your adventures lively.
